attributes.action: support the planning application for home a dog in Llanbedr Gwynedd Snowdonia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are a small dog rescue centre based in Llanbedr Gwynedd North Wales who help rescue unwanted and stray dogs that are in need of a new home.
Please see the website home a dog website  for more information about this worthy charitable concern.
